item.title: EU to announce ‘mother of all’ Indian trade deals - Financial Times
item.description: EU to announce ‘mother of all’ Indian trade deals Financial TimesExclusive: India to slash tariffs on cars to 40% in trade deal with EU, sources say ReutersEurope is aiming to sign a long-awaited free-trade deal with India The EconomistIndia, EU finalise FTA, deal set to be announced today | India News - The Times of India Times of IndiaFrom Defence To Worker Mobility, India-EU Free Trade Deal To Create History: 10 Points NDTV
